hero.heading: Informatics Management Department of Sriwijaya State Polytechnic
hero.description: Learn the ins and outs of information technology and business management to become a reliable professional ready to face the challenges of industry 4.0.

welcomingWord.heading: Department Head of Informatics Management
welcomingWord.description: We believe that technology is not just a tool, but a path to create meaningful change—and that is what we instill in Polsri Informatics Management.

profile.heading: Profile of the Informatics Management Department
profile.description: Informatics Management at Polsri produces IT experts with managerial skills through comprehensive education in application development, information systems, data analysis, and IT project management, supported by a relevant curriculum, expert lecturers, and modern facilities to prepare competent graduates ready to pursue careers in the digital era.
